Question: Sir Denis **** died of heart failure on 26 June 2003 and was cremated on 3 July.
Hints: This person suffered several small strokes in 2002 and was advised by her doctors not to engage in further public speaking.
Following several years of poor health, this person died on the morning of 8 April 2013 at the age of 87 after suffering a stroke.
The subsequent crisis was "a defining moment of her [this person's] premiership".
